name: Critter Blaster Extreme - Judge and Jury
name_original: Critter Blaster Extreme - Judge and Jury
description:
They murdered your father. They murdered your grandfather. They murdered your grand-grandfather. They murdered your -

They basically killed all your ancestors. They are forest critters.

Your job is to finally take revenge on your ancestors and kill the attacking animals! Oh, and they got some new technology. Can you beat the mecha bear or the suicidebombing rabbit?

- KILL! Shoot the invading critters!

- KILL! Defend the five paths leading to your home!

- KILL! Collect experience points to upgrade your weapons!

- KILL!! Hunting has never been easier since the animals are coming to you!
